task.title: Download the Desktop app for Trello-PC instructions
task.shortdesc: A step-by-step set of instructions on how to download the desktop app for Trello on both PC and Mac computers.

taskbody.context:
This page includes both step-by-step instructions to download the desktop application for Trello on PC and Mac computers.
Materials for PC:
Working Laptop/ desktop
Windows OS 10 or higher
Microsoft store account

step.cmd: Inorder to download the Trello desktop app for windows you must have a microsoft store account. See here on how to create a microsoft store account
Once you have an account you can search for Trello or in web browser search Trello desktop app.

Find the version you need, if you are using PC download Windows/Pc version, for these instructions we will be following the windows parameters, once you have found the version you need click to install
If you are downloading from within a web broswer you will now be prompted to sign into the microsoft store, if you are already in the microsofrt store it will begin downloading.
After it is finished downloading, the appplicaion will run, click continue, then either select login or signup. if you already have a Trello account go ahead and login.
Once you have done that you are now ready to use Trello as an application and no longer have to use it in a web browser.

task.title: Download the Desktop app for Trello-MAC instructions
task.abstract:
How to download Trello on Mac
Materials for Mac:
Working Mac laptop/ desktop
OS X 10.10.0 or later, 64-bit processor
Apple store account

step.cmd: Inorder to download the Trello app on Mac you must first have a apple account, if you do not set one up now.
Once you have an account you can search for Trello in the apple store or in web browser search Trello desktop app.
Find the version you need, if you are using Mac download Mac/Apple version, for these instrucions we will be following Mac parameters.
If you are downloading from a web browser you will be prompted to sign in to you apple account now. If you are already within the apple store you will begin downloading now.
After it is finished downloading, the appplicaion will run, click continue, then either select login or signup. if you already have a Trello account go ahead and login.
Once you are finished you can now access Trello from the application instead of the web browser.
